content.html:
[quote comment="13788"]

The plugin doesn't seem to work with http:// OpenIDs that delegate to https:// OpenIDs either. XRIs work great though. Thanks!

[/quote] Turns out it was a problem with the CA cert bundle in libcurl. I've had the good folks at Joyent update that and it seems to work fine. See new FAQ item in http://svn.wp-plugins.org/openid/trunk/readme.txt
